name: Tamageddon
description:
Tamageddon is a survival roguelike game set in a world where the inhabitants are balls. You are a ball and the enemies are balls, or similar spherical objects anyways. Get new weapons and power-ups as you level up and use these to make quick work of your foes.

When you begin your adventure you are pretty weak and may not last very long against the swarms of balls that will come for you. But as you play you unlock new characters, level up existing characters and unlock new power-ups.

Key features
  • Engage in action-filled fast-paced combat
  • Earn new weapons and power-ups as you level up
  • Unlock and level up several characters
  • Play through 6 different procedurally generated levels
  • Earn experience and unlock advancements
  • Unlock discoveries
